free_text.Learning outcomes: The objective of the course is to provide a basic understanding of a variety of modern optical methods of measurements and their applications in nondestructive testing. Both point-by-point and full-field methods are considered. Methods based on light scattering and light emission are also covered. Hands-on practical work will allow the students to practice some of these concepts.[br/]
